extension.news: 1.1.4 - Added support for enabling Auto-Play. 1.1.3 - Added afFENity 1.1.2 - Added Fen Light 1.1.1 - Minor bug fixes and cleanup 1.1.0 - Cleaned up code. Changed addonid from script to plugin. Added TheLab, TheLabjr, Dradis, Taz19 1.0.9 - Fixed bug preventing Umbrella 3D from being disabled. 1.0.8 - Added support for DV and 3D settings. Added Patriot, Black Lightning and 9-Lives. 1.0.7 - Added Coalition and Absolution. Removed The Promise. 1.0.6 - Added chains genocide and Quicksilver. 1.0.5 - Initial Release.
